shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=wzoom = 0.18*sin(time);
per_frame_2=q3=wzoom;
per_frame_3=q1 = 0.8 - 0.3*sin(-time*1.3);
per_frame_4=q2 = 0.8 - 0.3*cos(-time);
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=vol = 0.1*(vol*9 + (bass_att+mid_att+treb_att)*0.333333);
per_frame_7=q20 = vol;
per_frame_8=
per_frame_9=mtime = mtime+vol*0.05;
per_frame_10=rx = 0.5+0.4*sin(mtime*0.4);
per_frame_11=ry = 0.5+0.4*sin(mtime*0.6);
per_frame_12=q4=rx;
per_frame_13=q5=ry;
per_frame_14=tx = 0.5+1*sin(mtime*0.5);
per_frame_15=ty = 0.5+1*cos(mtime*0.74);
per_frame_16=q6=tx;
per_frame_17=q7=ty;
warp_1=`sampler sampler_grad16;
warp_2=`shader_body 
warp_3=`{ 
warp_4=`    float2 zoom = lerp(12,7,q20);
warp_5=`    float2 c = float2(q4, q5);
warp_6=`    float2 uxy = (float2(uv.x-0.5, uv.y-0.5))*zoom;
warp_7=`    float1 mm = -2;
warp_8=`
warp_9=`    float moduz = sqrt(uxy.x*uxy.x + uxy.y*uxy.y);
warp_10=`    float thetaz = atan2(uxy.y, uxy.x);
warp_11=`    uxy = (float2((pow(moduz, mm)*cos(thetaz*mm)), (pow(moduz, mm)*sin(thetaz*mm))))+c;
warp_12=`
warp_13=`    c = float2(q6, q7);
warp_14=`    thetaz = atan2(uxy.y, uxy.x);
warp_15=`    moduz = sqrt(uxy.x*uxy.x + uxy.y*uxy.y);
warp_16=`    uxy = (float2((pow(moduz, mm)*cos(thetaz*mm)), (pow(moduz, mm)*sin(thetaz*mm))))+c;
warp_17=`
warp_18=`    thetaz = atan2(uxy.y, uxy.x);
warp_19=`    moduz = sqrt(uxy.x*uxy.x + uxy.y*uxy.y);
warp_20=`    uxy = (float2((pow(moduz, mm)*cos(thetaz*mm)), (pow(moduz, mm)*sin(thetaz*mm))))+c;
warp_21=`
warp_22=`    float3 reta = tex2D(sampler_grad16, uxy); 
warp_23=`    ret = cross(reta, lum(reta));
warp_24=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`float3 aura = 0.05-GetBlur2(uv);
comp_4=`aura = float3(0, 0,aura.z);
comp_5=`    float3 boxave = (GetPixel(float2(uv.x+texsize.z*1,uv.y+texsize.w*1)) +
comp_6=`                     GetPixel(float2(uv.x-texsize.z*1,uv.y+texsize.w*1)) +
comp_7=`                     GetPixel(float2(uv.x-texsize.z*1,uv.y-texsize.w*1)) +
comp_8=`                     GetPixel(float2(uv.x+texsize.z*1,uv.y-texsize.w*1)) ) /4;
comp_9=`float3 reta = tex2D(sampler_main, uv);
comp_10=`reta = cross(1-boxave, reta)*1;
comp_11=`
comp_12=`ret = lum(reta+boxave);
comp_13=`ret = reflect(ret, lum(reta-0.3));
comp_14=`ret += aura+ret;
comp_15=`
comp_16=`ret*=5;
comp_17=`}
